channel.title: Celery on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Celery on Memo Tut

item.title: Asynchronous processing implementation in Django (Celery, Redis)
item.description: #About this article I think that asynchronous processing is essential when creating a web application with Django, and I would like to introduce its introduction with examples. The software to use is Celery(celery), ・About asynchronous processing by django+Celery ・How to implement asynchronous processing with Django I implemented it by referring to the article around here. ##environment ・Python 3.6.8 ・Django 2.2.7 ・CentOS7 What is asynchronous processing? Actually, I didn’t even know the word asynchronous processing until I actually encountered the problem.
